title: Median age of the population in Hong Kong 2015
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Median age in years, containing a total of 21 data points.
In general Median age in years has rose over the Year.

Median age in years is roughly constant from 1950 to 1960, roughly decreasing from 1960 to 1965, roughly constant from 1965 to 1970, rapidly increasing from 1970 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2050.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 1990 and 1995.
The highest Median age in years, of value 53.4 was reached at Year 2050
Minimum Median age in years about 21.3 was reached at Year 1965
